---
title: "Making Multiple Columns"
format: html
categories:
  - "Extra Writeups"
---

The following Quarto code:

<pre>
Hello this is my document

::: columns

::: {.column width="50%"}

Here is column 1

:::
::: {.column width="50%"}

Here is column 2

:::

:::
</pre>

Produces:

Hello this is my document

::: columns

::: {.column width="50%"}

Here is column 1

:::
::: {.column width="50%"}

Here is column 2

:::

:::
